overview: Matt runs the Product and Business Development team at AdReady, overseeing product strategy and strategic partnerships. Matt has more than ten years experience in the online advertising industry, ranging from rich media and video to targeting and creative management. He was previously General Manager of Display Advertising at Microsoft Advertising, where he was responsible for the Microsoft Media Network (Top 5 ad network), Atlas Advertiser Suite, premium advertising offerings on MSN and Windows live, and core display platform technologies. Previously, Matt headed up online marketing and media buying for GreaterGood.com, an online affinity shopping network. Matt holds a Masters in Business Administration from the University of Washington and a Bachelor of Arts from Georgetown University.

relationships.title: SVP of Product and Business Development
